values: Your Thorn for the Shaming of Satan: To the Class of 2018Your Thorn for the Shaming of Satan: To the Class of 2018

Your pains and weaknesses are not obstacles to everything you want to accomplish, but the very instruments God uses to make you more like his Son.Your pains and weaknesses are not obstacles to everything you want to accomplish, but the very instruments God uses to make you more like his Son.
